title: Generative AI-Enhanced STEM Inquiry Projects: Developing Sustainability and 21st-Century Problem-Solving Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic STEM concepts and fundamental smartphone operation skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning utilizing VR simulation tools in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design solutions for social issues linked to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs) using generative AI tools.
Learners can evaluate AI-generated prototypes and suggest improvements during the design-based learning phase.
Learners can analyze ethical usage principles of AI systems and data bias issues in an inquiry-based learning process.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
